title: Re: We have our first millionaire
content:
Hey, that's cool! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
As far as I know nobody has won the jackpot in the Finnish version of the Millionaire quiz.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: We have our first millionaire
content: Well, it's about damn time. I watched it last night. :-)-- Censorship is F**ked! --

title: Re: We have our first millionaire
content:
The quiz graphics reminds me of the German "Wer wird Millionr".
"Who Wants to Be a Millionaire" ? The German title means "Who will be millionaire". [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

Here you can see the that the graphics do look really similiar:
[img]http://www.liljan98.de/mmws/walter/artikel/fotos/frage125.jpg[/img]

And two fakes (I think [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] ):
[img]http://www.afrison.com/fun/newsletter/RTL_Bush_Millionaire1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.kein-plan.de/bitte-ziehen-sie-durch/pics/Bush_-_Jauch_(FakedByViktor).jpg[/img]
- We want "The Universe is Toast" ! - [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img]

title: Re: We have our first millionaire
content:
It's called Weekend Millionairs in the Netherlands, and yes, it's all the same thing. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: We have our first millionaire

title: Re: We have our first millionaire
content:
"Ah, they're all the same. Total crud the lot of em."

I second that.

Although watching a foreign version is fun - when I watched the Danish version not so long ago, they had to phone a friend to work out whether the capital city of Australia was Sydney or Canberra. Ha [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
